info.title: Security Center
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.Security (Azure Security Center) resource provider

get.description: Gets a list of Adaptive Network Hardenings resources in scope of an extended resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Gets a single Adaptive Network Hardening resource

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: adaptiveNetworkHardeningResourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Adaptive Network Hardening resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

post.description: Enforces the given rules on the NSG(s) listed in the request

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: adaptiveNetworkHardeningResourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Adaptive Network Hardening resource.

parameters.name: adaptiveNetworkHardeningEnforceAction
parameters.description: Enforces the given rules on the NSG(s) listed in the request

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

AdaptiveNetworkHardening.description: The resource whose properties describes the Adaptive Network Hardening settings for some Azure resource

networkSecurityGroups.description: The Azure resource IDs of the effective network security groups that will be updated with the created security rules from the Adaptive Network Hardening rules

effectiveNetworkSecurityGroups.description: The Network Security Groups effective on the network interfaces of the protected resource

rules.description: The security rules which are recommended to be effective on the VM

rulesCalculationTime.description: The UTC time on which the rules were calculated

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results

value.description: A list of Adaptive Network Hardenings resources

AdaptiveNetworkHardeningsList.description: Response for ListAdaptiveNetworkHardenings API service call

networkInterface.description: The Azure resource ID of the network interface

networkSecurityGroups.description: The Network Security Groups effective on the network interface

EffectiveNetworkSecurityGroups.description: Describes the Network Security Groups effective on a network interface

ipAddresses.description: The remote IP addresses that should be able to communicate with the Azure resource on the rule's destination port and protocol

Rule.description: Describes remote addresses that is recommended to communicate with the Azure resource on some (Protocol, Port, Direction). All other remote addresses are recommended to be blocked

AdaptiveNetworkHardeningEnforceAction.name: adaptiveNetworkHardeningEnforceAction
AdaptiveNetworkHardeningEnforceAction.description: Enforces the given rules on the NSG(s) listed in the request

AdaptiveNetworkHardeningResourceName.name: adaptiveNetworkHardeningResourceName
AdaptiveNetworkHardeningResourceName.description: The name of the Adaptive Network Hardening resource.
